itemDescription: Minister of the Presbyterian Church in Ireland and theological writer

wikipedia_page.main: Robert Watts, (1820–1895), Irish presbyterian minister, the youngest of fourteen children of a presbyterian farmer, was born at Moneylane, near Castlewellan, County Down, on 10 July 1820. He was educated at the parish school of Kilmegan, Co. Down, and at the Royal Belfast Academical Institution.

link_mentions.page: List of Moderators of the Presbyterian Church in Ireland

response: Robert Watts (born 1938) is a British film producer.
